tagline: Real Technology Support. Real Systems. Real People.
mission: Provide hands-on technical support, technology consulting, and digital systems for schools, nonprofits, businesses, and community organizations.
description: SeeZee Studios is a community technology partner built on trust and real support. We started on the ground — fixing computers, solving real problems, and supporting staff and students day-to-day. That long-term trust is what we're built on. We build websites, apps, AI systems, and dashboards for local organizations, then stay as long-term technology partners.
founded: Started as an FBLA project at Trinity High School in Louisville, KY. Evolved from a school project into a real consulting firm building modern solutions for community organizations.

team.name: Sean McCulloch
team.title: Lead Developer & Designer
team.focus: Full-stack development, system architecture, AI integration, technical support, accessible design
team.background: Years of on-site technical support experience including long-term work at local schools. Passionate about building scalable systems, AI automation, and Raspberry Pi projects. Leads all technical development and infrastructure.

team.name: Zach Robards
team.title: Operations & Client Experience
team.focus: Client relationships, technology consulting, project planning, user experience, training, content
team.background: Works directly with organizations to ensure every project serves their real needs. Explains technology clearly, helps make smart decisions that fit budgets and goals. Strong FBLA background in business applications. Also contributes to development.

differentiators: Years of hands-on technical support experience
Build modern systems AND provide ongoing support
Community-focused — prioritize organizations doing meaningful work
Don't disappear after setup — long-term partnership model
coreValues: AI should support people, not replace them
Simplicity scales — clear interfaces and predictable workflows win
Integration matters more than tools — connect what exists before adding more
Build. Support. Evolve. — don't launch and disappear
